channel.title: hospitals on mgei.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in hospitals on mgei.github.io

item.title: How far to the closest hospital?
item.description: Originally published on RPubs: http://rpubs.com/mgei/drivingtimes Intro Imagine you just fell out of a plane over Switzerland and landed at a random location. As you are wounded your number one concern it to get to a hospital asap. Not any hospital but one that has an emergency room and is equipped at least with a CT to check for fractures.

item.title: Swiss Hospitals Classification
item.description: Originally published on Github: https://github.com/mgei/swiss-hospitals-classification R Shiny app for cluster analysis A simple R Shiny app to classify Swiss hospitals according to their DRG positions using clustering and wordclouds. The app is also live for trying here: http://swiss-hospitals-classification.econovo.io/ Data We use data from the Swiss Federal Office of Public Health (BAG), i.e. data from the DRG Fallzahlensuche. We have the following script to scrape data from http://www.drg-fallzahlsuche.admin.ch

item.title: (de) Über die Fallzahlen in Schweizer Spitälern
